original_title: Kim og Wenche - retten til Ã¥ elske
overview: Norwegian Gay and Lesbian rights pioneer Karen-Christine (Kim) Friele and her lover Wenche Lowzow led the LGBT+ fight in the 1970's and today Norway is one of the most liberal country in the world. This film is a tribute and a close portrait of a couple who, more than anyone else in Norway, have become a symbol of the fight for queer rights and the right to love whoever we want.
title: Kim & Wenche - The Right to Love
